column5: The heat today was crazy. When the clouds moved in,the skies got dark,the wind picked up,the sky opened up. We went for a walk. So refreshing,and the fresh smell from the rain, was awesome.  RELIEF.     Gizmo loved it. Quick rub down and a happy dog.    Love the walks in the rain.
Brian, what are they building over there?  More condos?  I was wondering when I drove by the other day.
Not sure Bill. Been wondering myself. looks like a townhouse complex from what I can tell.
He's a cute little fella. The Mrs is ooing and aahing
I love to walk in the rain too B.  It sure is refreshing!!!
Cool pics Brian....Gizmo is a cool little character for sure.
Cute little pup you've got there Brian !!
My mom has a dog very similar to yours  and shares the same name
I thought the number one rule for Gremlins was never get them wet.
